data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The choice of the namespace was based on the other online banking
    automation namespaces (and the need to differentiate between the
    different Postbanks in the world). There is no module automating
    https://banking.postbank.de yet, and I feel a (personal) need to
    automate it.

    Web automating and finance modules have their place in the module
    list IMO.
